{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated **\$1.3M in 2021-2022** on contracts with MEDIA Q.

Across 113 contracts active since the start of the 2017-2018 fiscal year, 29 have at least one amendment (26%). Of contracts with amendments, the average increase in dollar value was 69% and the average number of amendments was 1.21. Cumulatively these amendments represent an increase of \$350.7K over the original contract values.

The average contract duration was 1.14 years, and the average contract value (not including contracts under \$10k) was \$59.1K. The longest contract was 6.01 years. The largest contract by value (including amendments) was \$466.6K.

{{< /entity_summary >}}
